com.dnastack.bob.client

Class BeaconNetworkClientImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dnastack.bob.client.BeaconNetworkClientImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BeaconNetworkClient

    public class BeaconNetworkClientImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements BeaconNetworkClient
    Beacon Network client implementation. The implementation is thread-safe except one operation - change of the service base url.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

        public void setServiceBaseUrl(java.lang.String serviceBaseUrl)
        Sets the service base url the client should be talking to.

        Note, this operation is not thread-safe.

        Parameters:

      • getResponse

        public com.dnastack.bob.service.dto.BeaconResponseDto getResponse(com.dnastack.bob.service.dto.ChromosomeDto chromosome,
                                                                  java.lang.Long position,
                                                                  com.dnastack.bob.service.dto.AlleleDto allele,
                                                                  com.dnastack.bob.service.dto.ReferenceDto reference,
                                                                  java.lang.String beaconId)
                                                           throws ForbiddenException,
                                                                  NotFoundException,
                                                                  InternalException
        Description copied from interface: BeaconNetworkClient
        Requests all beacons information on the specified genetic mutation.

        The response on the query will be put in BeaconResponseDto.response.

        BeaconResponseDto.response - true, when the response is YES.

        BeaconResponseDto.response - false or null, when the response is NO, or the beacon had problems answering the query.

        Specified by:
        getResponse in interface BeaconNetworkClient
        Parameters:
        chromosome - chromosome
        position - position
        allele - allele
        reference - assembly
        beaconId - ID of the beacon
        Returns:
        response
        Throws:
        ForbiddenException
        NotFoundException
        InternalException

      • getResponses

        public java.util.List<com.dnastack.bob.service.dto.BeaconResponseDto> getResponses(com.dnastack.bob.service.dto.ChromosomeDto chromosome,
                                                                                   java.lang.Long position,
                                                                                   com.dnastack.bob.service.dto.AlleleDto allele,
                                                                                   com.dnastack.bob.service.dto.ReferenceDto reference,
                                                                                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> beaconsIds)
                                                                            throws ForbiddenException,
                                                                                   InternalException,
                                                                                   NotFoundException
        Description copied from interface: BeaconNetworkClient
        Requests specified beacons information on the specified genetic mutation.

        The response on the query will be put in BeaconResponseDto.response.

        BeaconResponseDto.response - true, when the response is YES.

        BeaconResponseDto.response - false or null, when the response is NO, or the beacon had problems answering the query.

        Specified by:
        getResponses in interface BeaconNetworkClient
        Parameters:
        chromosome - chromosome
        position - position
        allele - allele
        reference - assembly
        beaconsIds - ids of beacons to request. If not specified, all beacons will be requested.
        Returns:
        list of responses
        Throws:
        ForbiddenException
        InternalException
        NotFoundException
